channel.title: Lists on Ray's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Lists on Ray's Blog

item.title: Favorite Open Source Projects
item.description: Here is a list of some open source projects I thought were fun and interesting. I will continually update this list of projects I find. Application Security: Brakeman Scanner: Able to detect vulnerabilities on the latest Ruby on Rails version. OWASP Dependency-Check: Able to detect vulnerabilities in project’s depedencies. Secure Code Game An application security coding game tuned for developers to correct vulnerabilities found. Cybersecurity Jobs: InfoSec-jobs Salaries Security specific job website created with open source tools and anonymous job salaries.
